item.title: Lucene.Net入门基础
item.description: 简单的例子 //索引 Private void Index() { IndexWriter writer = new IndexWriter(@"E:\Index", new StandardAnalyzer()); Document doc = new Document(); doc.Add(new Field("Text","哦耶,美丽的姑娘。", Field.Store.YES, Field.Index.TOKENIZED)); writer.AddDocument(doc);
